name: LookingGrimm
description:
Looking Grimm is a single-player 2D puzzle platformer game, based on the tale of The Wolf and the Seven Young Goats.  You are playing as the youngest goat trying to rescue his siblings, who were gobbled up by the evil wolf. Explore the lair of the wolf, which consists of many connected rooms, filled with traps and obstacles.

The main mechanic of the game is the time reversal ability of the goat. Use this ability to solve various puzzles to advance deeper into the lair and save your siblings.

You can play this game with  either keyboard or controller. The controls can be changed in the settings.
